description.@en: With a snap of your fingers, you can ignite a candle, torch or other tiny object thatâ€™s flammable.

data.distance: Any one object you can see

criticalFailure.@en: Fire suddenly engulfs your arm. You immediately suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] Damage from fire. If you suffer Injuries from this Damage, you are On Fire instead.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but you can ignite up to three objects instead.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can ignite a candle, torch or other tiny object you can see. It provides an insignificant amount of heat and light, equivalent to a candle. Its flames are considered to be Mildly Dangerous. Optionally, you can hold this burning light in your palm without risk of harm, until you must use your hand again.

reagents.@en: A drop of lantern oil rubbed between your fingers (expended)
